data.title: Masters Of Cloud, Part 1: The Players
data.text: Masters of Cloud is a three-part series aimed at understanding the cloud market and identifying potentially high return stock(s).

data.title: The Top 10 Reasons to Work at Google
data.text: Find out more about Google Incorporated and reasons why Google was named to Fortune magazine's list of the best companies for whom to work.

data.title: Google refreshes Android Auto with new features and a darker look
data.text: Android Auto — the in-car platform that brings the look and functions of a smartphone to the vehicle’s central screen — is getting a new look and improved navigation and communication features that will roll out this summer.

data.title: Tech companies can't do right thing when it hurts stock price, says expert
data.text: Tristan Harris, co-founder of the Center for Humane Technology, joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss how policy needs to shift to protect consumers using big tech.

data.title: UBS Says Alphabet 'Well-Positioned' For Local Ads
data.text: Google parent company Alphabet Inc is "well-positioned" to capitalize on local advertising, which represents 30 percent of the global ad and marketing services addressable market of around $650 billion excluding China, according to UBS.
